mdRecord.dcterms:title: Summons, Commonwealth of Virginia to the Washington family, 1816 February 10
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Lawrence Augustine, 1774-1824
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Commonwealth of Virginia Summons to the Washington family and extended family representatives, including Custis, Noblett, Parks, Davidson, Carter, Thronton, Dade, Spotswood, Foote, Peter, Law, and Lewis families to appear before clerk of chancery court Luke Bowyer, of Greenbrier County, Va. brought against them by Lawrence Augustine Washington. Subpoena acknowledged by Charles and Betty Carter. Autograph document signed, partly printed, 1 page.
